div.p: Proprietor of the piano manufacturing company Saphir, founded in 1886, located at Praterstraße 34 in the 2nd district of Vienna (Leopoldsstadt), and at Radetzkystraße 7 in the 3rd district (Landstraße). He was active also as a piano dealer between 1897 and 1909. His wife was Mathilde Saphir.

div.head: Saphir and Schenker
div.p: Saphir was in contact with Schenker in May 1918. No correspondence is known to survive between Josef Saphir and Schenker, but a letter from his wife is preserved as OJ 14/3 (1917).
